pages.text: The downfall of the Equivalators was the universe, the void, as they attempted to break the laws of nature. The modern alchemists (who I will now refer to as $(bold)$(6)Void Alchemists$()) utilize the power of the void itself instead of going against its ways. This allows for wonderous works, though delving into such emptiness has its sacrifices...

While your knowledge and power is still growing, it is good to start off using the power of the void in a simple way, with the $(bold)$(6)Apprentice's Stone$(). You can charge this with $(d)Zorumite Weapons$(), since they draw power from the void. Once fully charged, right click to create $(bold)$(6)Void Dust$().
This stone can be charged with $(bold)$(6)Void Energy$(), which can then be used to create $(d)Void Dust$().
$(d)Void Dust$() can be crafted into a bag for later uses.
$(d)Void Dust$() can also be crafted into a $(bold)$(6)Void Block$(), of which is fairly tough in comparision to stone. This can be used for later uses...
